document_data.name: Candle Lane
document_data.starts: The [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Candle Lane''', also known as '''Candle Alley''', was a minor avenue of hard-packed earth and [[gravel]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This curving road ran from east to west, running northwest off of the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] and terminating at [[Book Street]]. At Candle Lane's northeast end, it ended at the Way of the Dragon at a three-way junction with [[Zastrow Street]].
document_data.History: This street got its name from the gloomy overcast caused by the tall buildings that overhung it. The bookish sorts who traveled down the lane by [[candle]] light were often the target of [[thieves]], but by the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]] the street was heavily heavily patrolled.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Maernath Storage]], a warehouse.
* [[Thirsty Throat]], a tavern that stood at its eastern end,
